name: XANARTHRAXIA
description:
Stalwart knight! Align yourself for battle by syncronizing the energetic patterns within XANARTHRAXIA's ancient glyphs in this casual clicker RPG.

GAMEPLAY:String together fancy attack combinations by correctly matching the given shapes before the enemy has a chance to react. Resist endless waves of procedural enemy types with their own unique base stats. Heal yourself by clearing every single tile on the battlefield, and get as far as you possibly can before succumbing to the pressure that is the world of XANARTHAXIA.FEATURES:
  • Retro Pixel Art
  • Single Button Gameplay
  • Infinite Replayability
  • Custom Chip Tune Soundtrack
  • Integrated Indie Dev Support
